Localization.AboutToDie:
You are about to die, use /aid to call for a medic.
{0}
Localization.DontTrollTheMedic: How dare you call the medic and then don't wait for him before staying up again!
Localization.MedicAlreadyCalled: You already called for a medic, just wait for him.
Localization.MedicIncompetent: This incompetent troll of a medic is just to stupid to get you back up, we will get rid of him!
Localization.MedicToLate: Seems like your medic found some free beer on the way and won't come in time now ... I think we have to cut his salary!
Localization.NotEnoughMoney: You don't have enough money, how horrible ... You have {0} and you would need {1} so just wait the full {2} seconds for the medic.
Localization.NotEnoughMoney_ForcedEco: You don't have enough money, how horrible ... You have {0} and you would need {1}, maybe I'll come to your funeral then.
Localization.NotWounded: You're not wounded, get your extra shots somewhere else!
Localization.PermissionMissing: You have no permission to use this command, if you're wounded right now it means you're probably screwed!
Localization.Survived: The claws of death failed to claim you this time!
Localization.TheMedicIsComing: The medic is coming for you ... that means if you can survive another {0} seconds.
